subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacity of national institutions to manage the environment, protect cultural heritage and regulate economic policies.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Preparatory Assistence - Econo

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The output will include an assessment of the capacity of the electricity and water regulators to monitor the performance of electricity and water providers and activities aimed at strengthening these providers. The output will also support the formulation of policies aimed  at alleviating the impact of tariff increases on the poor. The last but not least support will be provided to strengthen the state institutions responsible for consumer protection, raise citizen's awareness on their rights as consumers and give them a stronger voice in defending their interest.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.title: Economic Governance
